document.full_text: the head of switzerland's anti-doping laboratory on friday denied claims that lance armstrong tested positive for performance-enhancing drugs at the 2001 tour de suisse and the results were covered up.
document.title: lab director denies hiding armstrong positive test
lines_and_colors: the head of switzerland's anti-doping laboratory on friday denied claims that lance armstrong tested positive for performance-enhancing drugs at the 2001 tour de suisse and the results were covered up.
